text.__SUMMARY__: Bulbophyllum sagemuelleri is a species of orchid in the genus Bulbophyllum  endemic to Negros Occidental, Philippines. It is named after Reinhard Sagemüller, father of Filipino Orchid Enthusiast Josef Sagemüller. It is placed in section Epicranthes ( which includes the former genus Epicranthes).
